title: The Professions Supplementary to Medicine (Amendment) Act, 2000
title_en: The Professions Supplementary to Medicine (Amendment) Act, 2000

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Professions Supplementary Short title
to Medicine (Amendment) Act, 2000, and shall be read and X   ".s
construed as one with the Professions Supplementary to
Medicine Act (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act)
and all amendments thereto.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The Second Schedule to the principal Act is amended 4medmsyt
